      LeetCode 21: Merge Two Sorted Lists í’€ì´

      ğŸ“Š ê²°ê³¼

      • ì†Œìš”ì‹œê°„: 40ë¶„
      • Runtime: 0ms (100%)
      • Memory: 42.40MB

      ğŸ’» ë‚´ ì½”ë“œ

      class Solution {
    public ListNode mergeTwoLists(ListNode list1, ListNode list2) {
        ListNode dummy = new ListNode();
        ListNode merged = dummy;
        
        while (list1 != null && list2 != null) {        
            if (list1.val > list2.val) {
                merged.next = list2;
                list2 = list2.next;
            } else {
                merged.next = list1;
                list1 = list1.next;
            }
            merged = merged.next;
        }

        if (list1 != null) {
            merged.next = list1;
        }
        if (list2 != null) {
            merged.next = list2;
        }

        return dummy.next;
    }
}

      ë‘˜ ì¤‘ í•˜ë‚˜ë§Œ ì‹¤í–‰ë˜ë¯€ë¡œ else if ê°€ëŠ¥

      âœ¨ ë¯¸ì„¸ ê°œì„ 

      class Solution {
    public ListNode mergeTwoLists(ListNode list1, ListNode list2) {
        ListNode dummy = new ListNode();
        ListNode merged = dummy;
        
        while (list1 != null && list2 != null) {
            if (list1.val <= list2.val) {
                merged.next = list1;
                list1 = list1.next;
            } else {
                merged.next = list2;
                list2 = list2.next;
            }
            merged = merged.next;
        }

        merged.next = (list1 != null) ? list1 : list2;
        
        return dummy.next;
    }
}
